Rules.Message: Bundle must contain a Patient resource.
Bundle must contain an Encounter resource.
Bundle must contain a HealthcareService resource.
Bundle must contain a Location resource.
Bundle must contain a Provider Organization.
Bundle must contain a Cluster Organization.
Bundle must contain a Hearing Screening (HS) Observation.
Bundle must contain an Oral Screening (OS) Observation.
Bundle must contain a Vision Screening (VS) Observation.
Resource.id must match GUID portion of entry.fullUrl (urn:uuid:<GUID>).
Logical id of Patient is mandatory.
NRIC identifier.system must be the PSS NRIC NamingSystem.
At least one address line is mandatory.
Language coding system must be urn:ietf:bcp:47.
Ethnicity must use the PSS ethnicity CodeSystem.
Ethnicity code must be a valid value from the ethnicity CodeSystem.
Residential status coding system is mandatory.
Residential status must use the PSS residential-status CodeSystem.
Residential status code must be a valid value from the residential-status CodeSystem.
Subsidy must use the PSS subsidy CodeSystem.
Subsidy code must be a valid value from the subsidy CodeSystem.
Consent for sharing must be boolean.
Resource.id must match GUID portion of entry.fullUrl (urn:uuid:<GUID>).
Encounter identifier.system must be the event-id NamingSystem.
Resource.id must match GUID portion of entry.fullUrl (urn:uuid:<GUID>).
HealthcareService identifier.system must be screening-campaign NamingSystem.
HealthcareService.providedBy.reference must reference a Provider Organization.
Resource.id must match GUID portion of entry.fullUrl (urn:uuid:<GUID>).
GRC must use the PSS grc CodeSystem.
GRC code must be a valid value from the grc CodeSystem.
Constituency must use the PSS constituency CodeSystem.
Constituency code must be a valid value from the constituency CodeSystem.
Observation.code.coding.code must be a valid screening-type code (HS/OS/VS).
Resource.id must match GUID portion of entry.fullUrl (urn:uuid:<GUID>).
Provider Organization HCI code is mandatory.
Provider Organization HCI identifier.system must be hci-code NamingSystem.
Provider Organization type must use organization-type CodeSystem.
Provider Organization type.coding.code must be PROVIDER.
Organization type code must be a valid value from the organization-type CodeSystem.
Resource.id must match GUID portion of entry.fullUrl (urn:uuid:<GUID>).
Cluster Organization HCI code is mandatory.
Cluster Organization HCI identifier.system must be hci-code NamingSystem.
Cluster Organization type must use organization-type CodeSystem.
Cluster Organization type.coding.code must be CLUSTER.
Organization type code must be a valid value from the organization-type CodeSystem.
Resource.id must match GUID portion of entry.fullUrl (urn:uuid:<GUID>).
Observation screening-type code must be HS.
At least one Observation.component is required.
Observation components must use valid question codes, displays, and allowed answers.
Pure Tone 25dBHL (Left) must be a pipe-separated list of values.
Pure Tone 25dBHL (Right) must be a pipe-separated list of values.
Pure Tone 40dBHL (Left) must be a pipe-separated list of values.
Pure Tone 40dBHL (Right) must be a pipe-separated list of values.
Resource.id must match GUID portion of entry.fullUrl (urn:uuid:<GUID>).
Observation screening-type code must be OS.
At least one Observation.component is required.
Observation components must use valid question codes, displays, and allowed answers.
Resource.id must match GUID portion of entry.fullUrl (urn:uuid:<GUID>).
Observation screening-type code must be VS.
At least one Observation.component is required.
Observation components must use valid question codes, displays, and allowed answers.

Questions.QuestionDisplay: Is the participant currently wearing hearing aid(s)?
Do participant need to change your hearing aid(s)?
AllowedAnswers: Yes (To skip hearing screening and refer to L2 Hearing)
No (To skip hearing screening and advise to continue follow up with audiologist)

Questions.QuestionDisplay: Did participant proceed with Hearing Screening?
Visual Ear Examination (Left Ear)
Visual Ear Examination (Right Ear)
Practice Tone (500Hz at 60dB in better ear)
Pure Tone Screening at 25dBHL (Left)
Pure Tone Screening at 25dBHL (Right)
Pure Tone Screening at 40dBHL (Left)
Pure Tone Screening at 40dBHL (Right)
Does participant have any upcoming appointment with ear specialist?
AllowedAnswers: Yes (To continue follow up with ear specialist)
No (Refer to L2 Hearing Follow Up if necessary)

Questions.QuestionDisplay: Does the participant require to refer to L2 Hearing?
Does the participant agree to proceed with L2 Hearing?
Is the participant currently wearing dentures or has dentures?
Placement of Denture (Upper)
Placement of Denture (Lower)
Did participant proceed with Oral Screening?
Do you have any dental pain on a scale of 1 to 10? (On a scale of 1-10, 1 being not painful at all and 10 being extremely painful)
Within the past 12 months, have you had any trouble speaking because of problems with your teeth, mouth or dentures?
Within the past 12 months, have you found it difficult to eat any foods because of problems with your teeth, mouth or dentures?
OHAT Status
Does participant have any upcoming appointment with any dentist?
AllowedAnswers: Yes (To continue follow up with dentist)
No (Refer to L2 Oral Follow Up)

Questions.QuestionDisplay: Does the participant require to refer to L2 Oral?
Does the participant agree to proceed with L2 Oral?
Is the participant currently wearing spectacles?
AllowedAnswers: Yes (To carry out vision test with participant's spectacles)

Questions.QuestionDisplay: Did participant proceed with Vision Screening?

Snellen Test (Right Eye)
(Please test the right eye first)
Snellen Test (Left Eye)

Pinhole Test (Right Eye)
(If Snellen is worse than 6/12, please continue with Pinhole and test the right eye first)
Pinhole Test (Left Eye)
Does participant have any upcoming appointment with any eye specialist or eye review at polyclinic or CHAS GP clinics?
AllowedAnswers: Yes (To continue follow up with the upcoming eye review in primary care or specialist clinic)
No (Refer to L2 Vision Follow Up)

Questions.QuestionDisplay: Does the participant require new spectacles?
Is the participant eligible for SMF (Spectacles)?
Has SMF (Spectacles) applied for the participant?
Does the participant require to refer to L2 Vision?
Does the participant agree to proceed with L2 Vision?
